idPropertyName.description: This is the id property name for instances of this conf type. For adaptor, this is "adaptorId".
idPropertyName.title: Id Property Name

idRegistryType.description: This is the registry type for instances of this conf type. For adaptor, this is "adaptor_id".
idRegistryType.title: Id Registry Type

idRuntimeObjectType.description: This is the runtime object type for instances of this conf type. For adaptor, this is "_AdaptiveAdaptor_".
idRuntimeObjectType.title: Id Runtime Object Type

isUnique.description: This configuration type can only be specified once.
isUnique.title: Is Unique

subtypePropertyName.description: This is the subtype property name for instances of this conf type.  For adaptor, this is "adaptorType".
subtypePropertyName.title: Subtype Property Name

subtypeRegistryType.description: This is the subtype registry type for instances of this conf type. For adaptor, this is "adaptor_type".
subtypeRegistryType.title: Subtype Registry Type

subtypeRuntimeObjectType.description: This is the subtype runtime object type for instances of this conf type. For adaptor, this is "_AdaptiveAdaptorType_".
subtypeRuntimeObjectType.title: Subtype Runtime Object Type
